item.title: Is the FDA Poised to Ban Talc?
item.description: The agency convened a panel to discuss whether the ingredient should be prohibited from foods, medicines, and cosmetics. Medscape Medical News

item.title: West Nile Virus Found in UK Mosquitoes for the First Time
item.description: The UK Health Security Agency reported that genetic fragments of the West Nile virus have been found in mosquito samples from Nottinghamshire. Medscap...

item.title: AI vs Physicians in 2050: Happy Future or No Future?
item.description: Is it dishonest to say ‘AI will never replace human doctors?’ Some say yes, some say no, but 25 years is an eternity in tech years. A few predictions....

item.title: Skin Cancer Burden Highest in Older Men, Rich Countries
item.description: Skin cancer affects millions of older adults worldwide, with men and high-income countries facing the highest burden of cases and deaths. Medscape Med...

item.title: Rural Patients Lose Options as Birth Facilities Shut Down
item.description: More than a hundred rural hospitals have stopped delivering babies since 2021, according to the Center for Healthcare Quality and Payment Reform. KFF ...
